name: weekly_theme
ddl:
CREATE TABLE weekly_theme (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	week_start DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	provider VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	theme_name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, 
	description TEXT, 
	relevance_score FLOAT, 
	update_count INTEGER, 
	created_at DATETIME, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)
